column5: i would like to know the laws on atv on logging roads . i am taking my 75 year old grand pa to a lake that is 2 miles in to the bush . i will be going west off of 502 . i am going to stay at a camp on red gut bay ,and do a day trip off cedar narrows road.
Carry insurance, wear helmets. That it. Four wheelers are used all the time in Ontario.
